item.title: My Actual First Post
item.description: In which I try to actually start a blog In 2010, my dad got me a domain name for my birthday. When he told me about it, he warned that he set it up in such a way as to motivate me to actually do something with my gift. There was some header text and a photo. If my memory serves me correctly, the header was “Rory’s Dad is amazing!” The text was red, the background was black.
